attributes.action: To get James McCarthy off a two year football ban
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Saturday 18th November 2006. James Mccarthy was banned for as what every supporter does and got caught up in the moment and was swearing as a Newcastle fan surely you must no, Between football fans the passion that comes with it. Could you please scrap this year as he really regrets what his actions has prevented him doing and thats attending Millwall F.C games. Week in week out you see passion which explodes into mindless incidents and when you reflect on it, you are disapointed. Everyone has done something theu regret and all im asking is please just scrap this year, he wasnt fighting and ive seen much worse and nothing has been done.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
